post.description: Use this API to create orders with Cashfree from your backend and get the payment link

order_id.description: Order identifier present in your system. Alphanumeric and only - and _ allowed.

order_amount.description: Bill amount for the order. Provide upto two decimals. 10.15 means Rs 10 and 15 paisa

order_currency.description: Currency for the order. INR if left empty. Contact care@cashfree.com to enable new currencies.

customer_id.description: A unique identifier for the customer. Use alphanumeric values only.

customer_bank_account_number.description: Customer bank account. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_ifsc.description: Customer bank IFSC. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_code.description: Customer bank code. Required for net banking payments, if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

return_url.description: The URL to which user will be redirected to after the payment on bank OTP page. Maximum length: 250.

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. Useful when userâ€™s connection drops while re-directing. NotifyUrl should be an https URL. Maximum length: 250.

payment_methods.description: Allowed payment modes for this order. Comma separated with following values - "cc", "dc", "ccc", "ppc", "nb", "upi", "paypal", "app"

order_expiry_time.description: Time after which the order expires. Customers will not be able to make the payment beyond the time specified here. We store timestamps in IST, but you can provide them in a valid ISO 8601 time format.

order_tags.description: Custom Tags which can be passed for an order. A maximum of 6 tags can be added

vendor_id.description: Vendor id created in Cashfree system

amount.description: Amount which will be associated with this vendor

percentage.description: Percentage of order amount which shall get added to vendor account

customer_id.description: A unique identifier for the customer. Use alphanumeric values only.

customer_bank_account_number.description: Customer bank account. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_ifsc.description: Customer bank IFSC. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_code.description: Customer bank code. Required for net banking payments, if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

return_url.description: The URL to which user will be redirected to after the payment on bank OTP page. Maximum length: 250.

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. Useful when userâ€™s connection drops while re-directing. NotifyUrl should be an https URL. Maximum length: 250.

payment_methods.description: Allowed payment modes for this order. Comma separated with following values - "cc", "dc", "ccc", "ppc", "nb", "upi", "paypal", "app"

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

post.description: Use this API when you have already created the orders and want Cashfree to process the payment.

channel.description: The channel for card payments will always be "link"

card_holder_name.description: Customer name mentioned on the card.

card_alias.description: Card alias as returned by Cashfree Vault API

card_bank_name.description: Card bank name, required for EMI payments. This is the bank user has selected for EMI

emi_tenure.description: EMI tenure selected by the user

channel.description: Specify the channel through which the payment must be processed.

upi_id.description: Customer UPI VPA to process payment.

channel.description: The channel for netbanking will always be `link`
Specify the channel through which the payment must be processed.

phone.description: Customer phone number associated with a wallet for payment.

emi_tenure.description: EMI tenure selected by the user

get.description: Use this API to view all details of an order.

schema.description: The order or invoice ID for which you want to view the order details.

customer_id.description: A unique identifier for the customer. Use alphanumeric values only.

customer_bank_account_number.description: Customer bank account. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_ifsc.description: Customer bank IFSC. Required if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

customer_bank_code.description: Customer bank code. Required for net banking payments, if you want to do a bank account check (TPV)

return_url.description: The URL to which user will be redirected to after the payment on bank OTP page. Maximum length: 250.

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. Useful when userâ€™s connection drops while re-directing. NotifyUrl should be an https URL. Maximum length: 250.

payment_methods.description: Allowed payment modes for this order. Comma separated with following values - "cc", "dc", "ccc", "ppc", "nb", "upi", "paypal", "app"

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

get.description: Use this API to view all payment details for an order.

schema.description: Order or the invoice ID for which you want to view the payment details.

get.description: Use this API to view payment details of an order for a payment ID.

schema.description: The order or invoice ID for which you want to view the payment details.
Cashfree payment ID to view the payment details of an order.

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

post.description: Use this API to initiate refunds.

schema.description: Order or the invoice ID for which refund must be initiated.

refund_amount.description: Amount to be refunded. Should be lesser than or equal to the transaction amount. (Decimals allowed)

refund_id.description: An unique ID to associate the refund with. Provie alphanumeric values

refund_note.description: A refund note for your reference.

example.failure_reason: Failed because UPI id no longer valid

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

get.summary: Get All Refunds for an Order
get.description: Use this API to fetch all refunds processed against an order.

schema.description: Order or the invoice ID for which you want to view the refund details.

example.failure_reason: Failed because UPI id no longer valid

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

get.description: Use this API to fetch a specific refund processed on your Cashfree Account.

schema.description: Order or the invoice ID for which you want to view the refund details.

parameters.name: refund_id
parameters.description: Refund Id of the refund you want to fetch.

example.failure_reason: Failed because UPI id no longer valid

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

get.description: Use this API to view all the settlements of a particular order.

schema.description: Order ID for which you want to view the settlements.

default.description: Any bad or invalid request will lead to following error object

example.message: bad URL, please check API documentation

post.description: Use this API to create a new payment link. The created payment link url will be available in the API response parameter link_url.

link_id.description: Unique Identifier (provided by merchant) for the Link. Alphanumeric and only - and _ allowed (50 character limit). Use this for other link-related APIs.

link_amount.description: Amount to be collected using this link. Provide upto two decimals for paise.

link_currency.description: Currency for the payment link. Default is INR. Contact care@cashfree.com to enable new currencies.

link_purpose.description: A brief description for which payment must be collected. This is shown to the customer.

link_partial_payments.description: If "true", customer can make partial payments for the link.

link_minimum_partial_amount.description: Minimum amount in first installment that needs to be paid by the customer if partial payments are enabled. This should be less than the link_amount.

link_expiry_time.description: Time after which the link expires. Customers will not be able to make the payment beyond the time specified here. You can provide them in a valid ISO 8601 time format. Default is 30 days.

send_sms.description: If "true", Cashfree will send sms on customer_phone

send_email.description: If "true", Cashfree will send email on customer_email

link_auto_reminders.description: If "true", reminders will be sent to customers for collecting payments.

link_notes.title: link_notes
link_notes.description: Key-value pair that can be used to store additional information about the entity. Maximum 5 key-value pairs

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. It should be an https URL.

upi_intent.description: If "true", link will directly open UPI Intent flow on mobile, and normal link flow elsewhere

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. It should be an https URL.

upi_intent.description: If "true", link will directly open UPI Intent flow on mobile, and normal link flow elsewhere

link_notes.description: Key-value pair that can be used to store additional information about the entity. Maximum 5 key-value pairs

send_sms.description: If "true", Cashfree will send sms on customer_phone

send_email.description: If "true", Cashfree will send email on customer_email

get.description: Use this API to view all details and status of a payment link.

schema.description: The payment link ID for which you want to view the details.

notify_url.description: Notification URL for server-server communication. It should be an https URL.

upi_intent.description: If "true", link will directly open UPI Intent flow on mobile, and normal link flow elsewhere

refund_note.description: A refund note for your reference.
